author: sky.cactus
content: Can anyone help me diagnose why the merge bot isn't triggering on this PR?  <https://github.com/ethereum/EIPs/pull/3112>

author: sky.cactus
content: It should be mentioning the authors for merge.

author: sky.cactus
content: Oh, maybe it is because all of the authors are email addresses?  I thought it would still create the message, it just would not actually contact anyone?
